patthana16.35:1.1_0: Sekkhaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasekkho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.35:1.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.35:2.1_0: Sekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasekkho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.35:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
